item.title: Rebecca: a harpist
item.description: Rebecca vian is a young emerging harpist. She graduated in October 2021 with full marks, cum laude and honorable mention from the Venice Conservatory “Benedetto Marcello”, where she studied with professor Elisabetta Ghebbioni. Rebecca distinguished herself within the Conservatory playing at first with the Venice Conservatory Symphony Orchestra, and then with the Orchestra of the Theatre “La Fenice”, where she debuted in May 2022 playing G.Pierné’s Konzertstück Op. 39. She had the chance to improve herself with some of the most important harpists from the Italian and global landscape, such as Emmanuel Ceysson (current principal harpist of the Los Angeles Philarmonic Orchestra and former principal harpist of the MET Opera Orchestra), Marie-Pierre Langlamet (principal harpist of the Berliner Philarmoniker), Elizabeth Fontan Binoche, Alexander Boldachev and Susanna Bertuccioli (principal harpist of the Orchestra del Maggio musicale fiorentino).
